name: Genex Ally Triforce
description:
1 "Genex" Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
This card's effect depends on the Attribute(s) of its non-Tuner Synchro Material Monsters. â— EARTH: If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate any Spell/Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step. â— FIRE: If this card destroys a monster by battle, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster. â— LIGHT: Once per turn, you can select 1 LIGHT monster in your Graveyard and Special Summon it in face-down Defense Position.
